channel.title: Who started scripting?
channel.description: Ok you know how C++ , ASCII, Java, ect are scripting languages to create programs? Well who started all of it? Like you couldnt create a scripting program without scripts. What do those scripting softwares run on? FOR THE LOVE OF GOD TELL ME IM GOING INSANE! :confused:

item.title: Who started scripting?
item.dc:creator: @cruel cruel
item.description:
@cruel wrote:

ASM / Binary / Machine Code

And scripting languages are technically languages that are interpreted. Although java is usually not considered as such. So C++ and other such languages aren’t scripting languages since they’re translated into machine code upon compilation.

Read full topic

item.title: Who started scripting?
item.dc:creator: @bullzeye95 bullzeye
item.description:
@bullzeye95 wrote:

Yeah I often think about this myself

Read full topic
